mapper.select: select concat(to_char(SYSDATE,'yyyyMMdd') , COALESCE(max(to_number(substr(purchase_num,9))),0 ) +1) from purchase where substr(purchase_num,1 ,8) = to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd')

select PURCHASE_NUM, PURCHASE_DATE, PURCHASE_PRICE, DELIVERY_ADDR , DELIVERY_ADDR_DETAIL, DELIVERY_POST, DELIVERY_PHONE , MESSAGE, PURCHASE_STATUS, MEMBER_NUM, DELIVERY_NAME , PURCHASE_NAME
from purchase where purchase_num = #{purchaseNum}
